dao.name: QRY_CONTACT_DT_IS_CONTACT_COD_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) as contactcount from contact_dt where athena_id = ? and trim(contact_cod) = trim(?) and rownum <= 1

dao.name: QRY_CONTACT_DT_IS_ADD_COD_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) as contactcount from contact_dt where athena_id = ? and trim(contact_cod) = trim(?) and rownum <= 1

dao.name: QRY_CONTACT_DT_SELECT
dao.statement: select contact_rmk as cust_tel from contact_dt where trim(cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod) and trim(contact_cod) = trim(:contact_cod)

dao.name: QRY_CONTRACT_DT
dao.statement: SELECT a.CONTRACT_COD, a.BEGIN_DAT, a.END_DAT, a.HOTEL_COD, a.RATE_COD, b.ratecod_nam, a.RSDISC_COD, a.REMARK1, a.REMARK2, a.INS_DAT, a.INS_USR, a.UPD_DAT, a.UPD_USR FROM CONTRACT_DT a left join ratecod_mn b on a.athena_id = b.athena_id and a.rate_cod = b.rate_cod and a.hotel_cod = b.hotel_cod WHERE a.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND a.CUST_COD = :cust_cod and trim(b.hotel_cod)= trim(:hotel_cod) order by a.begin_dat

dao.name: QRY_CONTRACT_DT_BY_CUST_COD
dao.statement: SELECT CONTACT_DT.athena_id "CONTACT_DT.athena_id", CONTACT_DT.cust_cod "CONTACT_DT.cust_cod", CONTACT_RF.CONTACT_COD "CONTRACT_DT.CONTACT_COD", CONTACT_RF.CONTACT_NAM "CONTACT_RF.CONTACT_NAM", CONTACT_DT.CONTACT_RMK "CONTACT_DT.CONTACT_RMK" FROM CONTACT_DT, CONTACT_RF WHERE CONTACT_RF.ATHENA_ID = CONTACT_DT.ATHENA_ID(+) AND CONTACT_RF.CONTACT_COD = CONTACT_DT.CONTACT_COD(+) AND CONTACT_RF.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND CONTACT_DT.CUST_COD(+) = :cust_cod ORDER BY CONTACT_RF.SEQ_NOS, CONTACT_RF.CONTACT_COD
